data.author: Ingrid Bergman
data.quote: I remember one day sitting at the pool and suddenly the tears were streaming down my cheeks. Why was I so unhappy? I had success. I had security. But it wasn't enough. I was exploding inside.

data.author: Johnny Carson
data.quote: Talent alone won't make you a success. Neither will being in the right place at the right time, unless you are ready. The most important question is: 'Are your ready?'

data.author: DJ Khaled
data.quote: I've been blessed to be somebody that's been climbing that success mountain top for years of hard work, you know, but now it's all connecting. And now, the whole world is watching, you know what I'm saying, and it feels good 'cause it's good energy. This is all positive vibes, and good vibes and good energy, so it feels incredible.

data.author: Kate Middleton
data.quote: George loves the T Rex because it's the noisiest and the scariest.

data.author: C. S. Lewis
data.quote: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success.

data.author: Charlie White
data.quote: The most important thing is being passionate about what you're doing and always give it your all. That is the key to success.

data.author: Satya Nadella
data.quote: When I grew up here, there was no T-Hub. Probably, the closest to T was the Tank bund.

data.author: James Wolfe
data.quote: Possessed with a full confidence of the certain success which British valor must gain over such enemies, I have led you up these steep and dangerous rocks, only solicitous to show you the foe within your reach.

data.author: Denis Waitley
data.quote: Success is almost totally dependent upon drive and persistence. The extra energy required to make another effort or try another approach is the secret of winning.

data.author: Chet Atkins
data.quote: A long apprenticeship is the most logical way to success. The only alternative is overnight stardom, but I can't give you a formula for that.

data.author: Epictetus
data.quote: Not every difficult and dangerous thing is suitable for training, but only that which is conducive to success in achieving the object of our effort.

data.author: W. Clement Stone
data.quote: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.

data.author: Emile Zola
data.quote: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.

data.author: Laila Ali
data.quote: 'All in With Laila Ali' is educational, inspirational, compelling programming profiling individuals that have reached for the sky, pushed themselves to the limit and did things that you would think were impossible.

data.author: Fred Hammond
data.quote: We sing inspirational songs, songs of praise and worship, and about how good and how big God is. We are magnifying the Lord.

data.author: Bernie Mac
data.quote: Whatever success I've had, I always like to top it.

data.author: Michael Nutter
data.quote: I think that when we have a better educated society, when there is less violence in our cities, when people get back into the workforce and have the opportunity to take care of themselves and their families - that for me really is the kind of success and the kind of America that I think most of us still want, we aspire to.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

data.author: James Iha
data.quote: I love a lot of the New York bands, but Patti Smith stands out. I just read 'Just Kids' and it's an inspirational, well-written account of an emerging New York artist in the late seventies.

data.author: Robert Kiyosaki
data.quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
